root.title: asset u.s. monei fund rise week
root.body: asset monei market mutual fund increas 720.4 mln dlr week end yesterdai 236.90 billion dlr invest compani institut sai asset 91 institut fund rise 356 mln dlr 66.19 billion dlr 198 gener purpos fund rise 212.5 mln dlr 62.94 billion dlr 92 broker dealer fund rise 151.9 mln dlr 107.77 billion dlr
